text: Giorgio Bulgari (5 May 1890 - 6 March 1966) was an Italian businessman, son of Sotirios Bulgari, the founder of the luxury brand Bulgari. ==Early life== Giorgio Bulgari was born on 5 May 1890, the second of three sons of Sotirios Bulgari (born Boulgaris) and his wife Elena. ==Career== Giorgio and his elder brother Costantino Bulgari (born 1889) learned silversmithing and jewellery making from their father, which they took over on his death in 1932. ==Personal life== He had three children; Gianni was born in 1935 and Paolo in 1937, and Nicola in 1941. He died on 6 March 1966, and is buried in the Protestant Cemetery, Rome. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1966 deaths Category:People from Rome Georgio Category:Italian businesspeople in fashion Category:Italian people of Greek descent Category:Italian people of Aromanian descent Category:Italian Protestants Category:Place of death missing Category:Burials in the Protestant Cemetery, Rome
